message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I believe this is a good deal for both of us.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable. This offer is more reflective of the fact that I'll have to wait longer to get my share.
Bob, my offer is getting worse with inflation, while yours wasn't that great to begin with. Let's meet in the middle before this gets even worse for me.
